entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Items in CollectionView take up large vertical space in iOS #24392
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24386
    9.0-rc1
  • Application works in Debug build but crashes in Release build when binding ImmutableArray to ItemsSource with x:Static #24384
  • Android app doesn't build in Release mode (Mono Ahead of Time compiler) #24380
  • `CollectionView` throws `NRE` when `ItemTemplate` uses a `ViewCell` as parent #24379
  • didReceiveIncomingPushWithPayload does not work with closed or background application #24374
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` #24373
    9.0-rc1
  • Picker's SelectedItem in CollectionView DataTemplate not working #24369

Closed

  • MAUI Breaks Cohesive Design Principle #24383
  • WebAuthenticator on Windows throws unhelpful errors #23616
  • [Bug] [Android] Inconsistent toolbar text color on interaction. #10660
    Backlog
  • Android project ToolbarItem font color exception after changing available state #22937
    Backlog
  • TouchEffect cancels all gesture recognizers on iOS (at least) #24381
  • Crash on ios when open new screen or navigate back to it #24032
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Can't run the test App from the MAUI introduction project #24375
  • Span text-decoration is incorrect whereas the Label behaves properly #23488
    Backlog
  • A double click (only clicked event defined) on a MenuFlyoutItem adds multiple pages #16276
  • premissions .Net Maui c# android do not work #24179
  • The icon on MacOS does not change in the application. #23816
  • Exception on MAUI after Update #24185
  • Adding IconImageSource to the contentpage in xaml crashes in .NET MAUI for IOS #24182
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection gives exception and prevents the app from running #24186
  • App requesting NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription #19918
  • .NET 8.0 iOS app crashes on lauch since updating to iOS 18.3 beta #23753

PullRequests

Created

  • Use newer default backup rules for android #24391
  • [ci] Build public #24388
  • Add Styleable Element to simplify styling for external libraries #24387
  • Add support for `TextAlignment.Justify` - fix #24376
    community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24372
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨

Merged

  • Merge SR8 into main #24382
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix ToolbarItem font color issue after changing available state. #24065
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9
  • [net9.0] Update packages rc1 #24371
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove excessive ListView API doc #24327
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr8] Backport maestro and artifact drop infra improvements from net9.0 #24378
  • Fix "XamlC error: key was not present in the dictionary" when `OnIdiom` is used in… #24367
  • [Windows] Fix Span Foreground property #24063
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266

    testing-green-ci

    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨

    community ✨

    area-testing
